headline.main: Sikh pilgrims commemorate death of first martyr
headline.sub: Sikh pilgrims commemorate death of first martyr

docs.snippet: Hundreds of Sikh pilgrims gather in Lahore to pay tribute to their first martyr, Guru Arjun Dev. Diane Hodges reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Hundreds of Sikh pilgrims gather in Lahore to pay tribute to their first martyr, Guru Arjun Dev. Diane Hodges reports.

headline.main: Choosing Your Own: Definition of Race Becoming Fluid
headline.print_headline: Choosing Your Own: Definition of Race Becoming Fluid

docs.snippet: Rachel Dolezal, born to white parents, self-identifies as black — a decision that illustrates how fluid identity can be in a diversifying America, as the rigid racial structures that have defined most of this country's history seem, for some...
docs.lead_paragraph: Rachel Dolezal, born to white parents, self-identifies as black — a decision that illustrates how fluid identity can be in a diversifying America, as the rigid racial structures that have defined most of this country's history seem, for some, to be softening.

headline.main: NATO's spearhead force holds first exercise
headline.sub: NATO's spearhead force holds first exercise

docs.snippet: NATO's "spearhead" forces train together for first time during the exercise Noble Jump in Poland. Rough Cut (no reporter narration)....
docs.lead_paragraph: NATO's "spearhead" forces train together for first time during the exercise Noble Jump in Poland. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).

headline.main: Official: Dominican Republic Ready to Resume Deportations
headline.print_headline: Official: Dominican Republic Ready to Resume Deportations

docs.snippet: Authorities are prepared to resume deporting non-citizens without legal residency in the Dominican Republic after largely putting the practice on hold for a year, the head of the country's immigration agency said Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Authorities are prepared to resume deporting non-citizens without legal residency in the Dominican Republic after largely putting the practice on hold for a year, the head of the country's immigration agency said Tuesday.

headline.main: Manfred Says MLB Can Expand Fan Netting Without Bargaining
headline.print_headline: Manfred Says MLB Can Expand Fan Netting Without Bargaining

docs.snippet: Major League Commissioner Rob Manfred says management can order expanded netting to protect fans without bargaining over the matter with the players' association....
docs.lead_paragraph: Major League Commissioner Rob Manfred says management can order expanded netting to protect fans without bargaining over the matter with the players' association.

docs.snippet: Get recommendations from New York Times reporters and editors, highlighting interesting stories from around the web. In this installment, great reads from Fernanda Santos, Jenna Wortham and others....
docs.abstract: Get recommendations from New York Times reporters and editors, highlighting interesting stories from around the web. In this installment, great reads from Fernanda Santos, Jenna Wortham and others.

headline.main: United Airlines to Stop Flights to JFK in October
headline.print_headline: United Airlines to Stop Flights to JFK in October

docs.snippet: United Airlines will stop flying to John F. Kennedy International Airport in October and shift premium cross-country flights there to its nearby hub in Newark, New Jersey....
docs.lead_paragraph: United Airlines will stop flying to John F. Kennedy International Airport in October and shift premium cross-country flights there to its nearby hub in Newark, New Jersey.

headline.main: Saad's New Deal Key Part of Blackhawks' Offseason
headline.print_headline: Saad's New Deal Key Part of Blackhawks' Offseason

docs.snippet: Moments after Chicago won the Stanley Cup for the third time in six seasons, Stan Bowman went back to work....
docs.lead_paragraph: Moments after Chicago won the Stanley Cup for the third time in six seasons, Stan Bowman went back to work.

headline.main: Prosecutors: Off-Duty Cop Chases, Fatally Shoots Ex-Wife
headline.print_headline: Prosecutors: Off-Duty Cop Chases, Fatally Shoots Ex-Wife

docs.snippet: A recently divorced off-duty police officer chased down and fatally shot his ex-wife on Tuesday, then put the gun to his head and held police at bay before he surrendered, authorities said....
docs.lead_paragraph: A recently divorced off-duty police officer chased down and fatally shot his ex-wife on Tuesday, then put the gun to his head and held police at bay before he surrendered, authorities said.

headline.main: Colombian Fans Caught With Drugs, Knives and a 40cm Sabre
headline.print_headline: Colombian Fans Caught With Drugs, Knives and a 40cm Sabre

docs.snippet: Chilean customs officials found cocaine, marijuana, LSD, knives and a 40-centimetre-long sabre in two buses carrying Colombian football fans to the Copa America, the national customs service said on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Chilean customs officials found cocaine, marijuana, LSD, knives and a 40-centimetre-long sabre in two buses carrying Colombian football fans to the Copa America, the national customs service said on Tuesday.
